import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import '../styles.scss'; export default function MemberInfo(data) { const [tab,setTab] = useState(1); const [member, setMember] = useState(false); const partnerOn = Date.parse(data.partnerWhen) const turnedPartner = new Date(partnerOn) useEffect(() => { data.isPartner ? setMember(true) : setTab(4) },[]) return (
    { member ? <>
  • setTab(1)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 1 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Visão geral

  • setTab(2)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 2 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Atuação

  • setTab(3)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 3 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Estatísticas

    • : <>

  • Professor?

    • }
{ tab === 1 &&
  • location_on

    {data.city}

  • home

    {data.personal_address}

  • phone

    {data.tel}

} { tab === 2 &&
  • location_on

    {data.location}

  • bookmark

    {data.work_address}

  • group

    Membro desde:

    {' ' + turnedPartner.getDate() }/{1 + turnedPartner.getMonth() }/{turnedPartner.getFullYear()}

} { tab === 3 &&
  • bar_chart

    {data.projects_amount} Projeto(s)

  • compare_arrows

    {data.total_orders} Pedido(s)

} { tab === 4 &&

  • Torne-se membro para usufruir de todos os recursos do website.

}
); }
